content.raw:
Unless the `labscript_devices` files are relying on the current directory being the BLACS directory, then changing them would be good but is independent of this change. So I agree, but it is not blocking merging this for example.
Similarly for everything else in labscript using `__file__`, I know there are more (48 according to grep). There are also several `os.chdir()`'s, but I think the only two that need changing are runviewer and runmanager, the rest exist for good reason.

Agreed about the backward compatibility, will do.
